short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For knowledge workers that work long hours. This extension reminds you to take regular breaks & gives you simple exercises.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Set your own timing to take breaks at regular intervals. At the end of each interval, you'll be reminded to take a break and do a simple exercise for one minute helping you reset and focus again. This helps improve your overall health and focus.

Make sure to turn on Chrome notifications in your system settings.
